TopicTitle: The Official KSP Kirby Discussion Thread

Articles.Content:
Everyone here probably knows what Kirby is. I have been a fan of the series since when I first played KSSU, and find the series to have some of the most dark and epic boss battles ever.

To start the discussion, who do you think is the most dark and epic Kirby boss?
KING DEDEDE will always be the most terrifying boss since i encountered him in kirby's dreamland 2. he looks so..unsuspicious..but then HAMMERTIME
I consider it to be Magalor from KRTD. Those last battles got quite insane.
I never knew him until I just googled. It was also Coolys old avatar.
Speaking of Kirbies, my science teacher happened to photoshop 3 of them to the Mun:  https://www.deviantart.com/richmountain112/art/Kerbals-and-Kirbies-878690375
i thought this thread was about vacuum cleaners. carry on.
